location.dreamscape.name: Dreamscape
GMCM.ModEnabled.Name: Mod Enabled
GMCM.MaxTrees.Name: Max Trees
GMCM.MaxTrees.Tooltip: The maximum number of trees beyond which no more trees will spawn at the start of the day.
GMCM.TreeGrowthStage.Name: Tree Growth Stage
GMCM.TreeGrowthStage.Tooltip: Growth stage of trees spawned at the start of the day.
GMCM.TreeSpawnChance.Name: Tree Spawn Chance
GMCM.TreeSpawnChance.Tooltip: Daily chance for a tree to spawn on each empty cloud tile.
GMCM.ObjectSpawnChance.Name: Object Spawn Chance
GMCM.ObjectSpawnChance.Tooltip: Daily chance for an object (crystal or gem resource) to spawn on each empty cloud tile.
